fields.name: Formal survey/census: total count (the total reserve sampled in an attempt to count all individuals present, e.g., helicopter total count)
Formal survey/census: total population estimated from sample counts (a sample of the total reserve area was surveyed, e.g., aerial or ground transects/blocks, a camera trap array)
Database of known individuals (not all individuals known, minimum estimate)
Exact or near-exact estimate: all individuals or groups are known
Other (please describe how the population size estimate was determined)
